summary: Phase 7A Real Estate Suite S4 Admin UI testing completed successfully. All 6 pages load correctly with demo data. NGN currency formatting (₦) displays properly across all pages. Demo Mode badge visible on dashboard. All quick action buttons are clickable. Search and filter functionality works correctly.

issues: Breadcrumb 'Real Estate' text is not a clickable link - should navigate back to dashboard

action_items: Minor: Consider making breadcrumb 'Real Estate' text a clickable link to navigate back to dashboard
critical_code_review_comments: All 6 Real Estate Suite pages render correctly with demo data
NGN currency formatting uses Intl.NumberFormat with 'en-NG' locale - correct implementation
Demo Mode badge displays correctly on dashboard
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
Search and filter functionality works correctly on all list pages
Quick action buttons are all visible and enabled
Status badges (OCCUPIED, VACANT, ACTIVE, EXPIRED, PAID, OVERDUE, EMERGENCY, etc.) display with correct colors
Priority badges on maintenance requests show correct color coding
All pages use consistent layout and styling

success_rate.frontend: 100% - All 6 pages load correctly with demo data

test_credentials: None required - Demo data rendered in components
seed_data_creation: None - Uses hardcoded demo data in components
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase 7A Real Estate Suite S4 Admin UI is complete. All interactive elements (buttons, search, filters) are functional. Demo data is hardcoded in each component - no backend API calls required for display.
